ygData.messageBody:
Well then. You should be proud of yourself for pulling your woman
out of that environment and making a difference in her life. Have
you ever checked into the men's movement? They support men who are
using their male energy to protect and serve the family.

My EQ addict (18.5) yr old is finally off to college in less than 2
months. If he flunks out, he is NOT going to be parking his butt
here in front of the computer! Their parents are enablers.


*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

about

meets
____online. They both have (as does my wife) several 60+ level EQ
____characters. Neither have ever been married; both still live
with
____their mother and stepfather. Their biological father was
arrested a
____couple of years ago (charges later dropped) for sexually
abusing his
____teenage stepdaughter.
